verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:19
verses.text: And this was yet a small thing in thy sight, O Lord God; but thou hast spoken also of thy servant’s house for a great while to come. And is this the manner of man, O Lord God?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:20
verses.text: And what can David say more unto thee? for thou, Lord God, knowest thy servant.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:21
verses.text: For thy word’s sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all these great things, to make thy servant know them.
